about-me.first: Hi, I'm Gustavo, and I've been working as a developer since 2018. I'm currently a front-end developer focusing on React, but I also have some experience in the back-end with Node and in mobile with React-Native.
about-me.second: I believe my main strengths are teamwork, as collaboration is essential to achieving the best results both in the final product and in the development of the team as a whole.
about-me.third: I also focus on the end-user experience, ensuring that each application is delivered according to requirements, focusing on a simple and efficient user experience. I'm always striving to develop my skills, keep up with market trends, and create solutions that deliver value to the end user.

agile-methodologies.title: Agile Methodologies
agile-methodologies.description: Experience with agile teams and processes (Scrum, Kanban, etc.)

ci-cd-pipeline.title: CI/CD Pipeline
ci-cd-pipeline.description: Experience with automated processes to optimize the software development cycle.

clean-code.title: Clean Code
clean-code.description: Code practices for code readability, maintainability, and scalability.

petshop.title: Pet Shop Schedule
petshop.description: The application consists of a scheduling system for a Pet Shop, allowing users to create, edit, and remove appointments.

task-list.title: Tasks Management
task-list.description: This application was developed to practice and demonstrate the use of drag and drop in front-end development using the Dnd Kit library, in conjunction with React and Vite.

responsiveness.title: Responsiveness
responsiveness.description: Better user experience across all devices and quality for SEO.

unit-tests.title: Unit Tests
unit-tests.description: For early bug detection, which speeds up debugging and reduces costs.
